catalog_info.title: Livestock Summary - Western India
catalog_info.description: This dataset provides a summary of livestock populations (bovine cattle, buffalo, goats, and sheep) across various locations in Western India. It is valuable for AI modeling related to agricultural planning, resource allocation, and livestock disease prediction, enabling proactive interventions and improved animal husbandry practices.

provenance.ministry: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying
provenance.department: Department of Animal Husbandry and Dairying

spatial_temporal.spatial_coverage: Districts of Gujarat and Rajasthan, India
